name: Lifetime free Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder for WordPress VForm
author: Vikas Ratudi

sections.description:
Revolutionize the way you create forms with the world’s first Full Lifetime free Form Builder for WordPress! Say goodbye to limited templates and restrictions, and hello to unlimited customization and creativity. With this powerful tool, you can easily design and publish stunning forms that perfectly match your brand and capture the attention of your audience. Whether you’re a blogger, business owner, or developer, this game-changing form builder will take your WordPress website to the next level. Don’t miss out on the future of form creation – try it today!

  • Say goodbye to complex coding and tedious form creation with a user-friendly drag-and-drop interface that makes designing forms a breeze.

  • Enjoy complete creative freedom with an extensive range of customization options, including unlimited fields, colors, fonts, and styling choices.

  • Make your forms stand out with advanced features such as conditional logic, multi-page forms, file uploads, and integrations with popular email marketing and CRM platforms.

  • Create responsive and mobile-friendly forms that look great on any device, ensuring a seamless user experience for your visitors.

  • Save time and effort with pre-built form templates for common use cases such as contact forms, feedback forms, surveys, and more.

  • Enjoy the benefits of a fully free and open-source solution that is constantly updated and supported by a dedicated community of developers.

Overall, the world’s first Full free Form Builder for WordPress offers an unbeatable combination of power, flexibility, and ease of use that will transform the way you create forms and collect data on your website.

CAN’T BELIEVE IT? GIVE IT A TRY!

Here are the contact form fields & Features that comes with Vform Form Builder:

  • Title
  • Single Line Text
  • Paragraph Text (Textarea)
  • Dropdown Field
  • Multiple Choice (Radio Buttons)
  • Checkboxes
  • Numbers Field
  • Name Field
  • Email Address Field
  • Website / URL
  • Address
  • Phone
  • Password
  • Date/Time
  • Hidden Field
  • Page Break
  • Divider
  • Terms & Conditions
  • Link
  • Image
  • Date
  • Time
  • Months
  • Weeks
  • Color
  • Button
  • reCAPTCHA
  • hCaptcha
  • Easy & Fast
  • Status Active / Inactive
  • Easy Edit / Delete
  • Email Notification
  • Confirmation Message
  • Confirmation Show Page
  • Confirmation Go to URL(Redirect)
  • Entries Lists
  • Entries (A Brand New Feature Addon)

Notes

Please feel free to follow me on Instagram for latest updates: Follow.

More Tutorial and help tricks Subscribe our Youtube Channel: Subscribe

If you have any suggestion/query just email me:) vforminfo@gmail.com.

I feel that we have done that here. I hope you enjoy using VForms.

Thank you

Vikas Ratudi
sections.faq:
How can it be Lifetime free?

We know your problem regarding the contact form and lead generation form so we are trying to build a user-friendly builder with lifetime updates and free. Just give it a try.

Who should use Vform?

Vform is perfect for business owners, bloggers, designers, developers, photographers, and basically everyone else. If you want to create a custom WordPress form, then you need to use the Vform drag & drop form builder.

Do I need to have coding skills to use Vform?

Absolutely not. You can create and manage forms without any coding knowledge (100% drag & drop form builder). Vform is the most beginner friendly contact form plugin in the market.

What type of WordPress forms can I build with Vform?

Vform simple & Fast form builder is the most powerful WordPress contact form plugin in the market. Here are some types of WordPress forms you can create:

  • Simple Contact Forms
  • Job Application Contact Form
  • Feedback Survey Contact Form
  • Make a Suggestion Contact Form
  • Change Request Forms
  • Online Booking Forms
  • Event Booking Form
  • Maintenance Request Contact Form
  • Make a Referral Contact Form
  • Volunteer Registration Contact Form

Which Form Fields Does Vform offer?

We made Vform form builder to be both easy and powerful.

Can I integrate Vform with my CRM or Email Marketing Service?

Not Now, but we will work on that.

Can I create a Payment Form with Vform

Not Now, but we will work on that.

Is Vform translation ready?

Not Now, but we will work on that.

Does Vform include spam protection?

For now, we just added small protection and Google RECAPTCHA will be added soon.

Can I Import / Export Forms with Vform?

For now, you can’t import/export the forms in forms, we working on that and ready as soon as possible:)

What should I do when I experience any problem?

Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com
